Download¶

The SpiCE corpus will be made freely available to reseachers early 2021. On this page, you will find a link to the repository of high-quality WAV files, accompanying transcriptions, language background summary information, as well as information about the Creative Commons license.

Stay tuned! Follow @khia_johnson on Twitter for updates.

Releases¶

Release no. 1¶

The first release is planned for early 2021, and will include audio, corrected orthographic transcriptions, force-aligned transcripts using the Montreal Forced Aligner, and a summary of participant language background information.

Future releases¶

Future releases of the corpus will likely include any necessary corrections to the transcripts, additional detail at the level of the phone, or something else!
